meta.title: Ion & Tatiana's Wedding
meta.description: Join us to celebrate our special day

timeline.title: First Meeting
timeline.description: Sometimes the most beautiful love stories begin with the simplest moments. When we first met, we knew there was something special between us.

timeline.title: Growing Closer
timeline.description: Through countless conversations and shared dreams, we discovered that we were meant to walk this path together.

timeline.title: Building Our Future
timeline.description: Together we created a home filled with love, laughter, and endless possibilities. Every day brought us closer.

timeline.title: The Proposal
timeline.description: In a moment that felt like destiny, Ion asked Tatiana to be his forever. The answer was a resounding yes, sealing our promise of eternal love.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our big day

questions.question: What should I wear?
questions.answer: The dress code is semi-formal. We recommend cocktail dresses for ladies and suits for gentlemen. The ceremony and reception will take place outdoors on grass, so please choose appropriate footwear.

questions.question: Is parking available?
questions.answer: Yes, complimentary valet parking will be available at the venue. You may also use ride-sharing services if preferred.

questions.question: Can I bring a plus one?
questions.answer: Due to venue capacity, we can only accommodate the guests listed on your invitation. Please refer to your invitation for the specific number of seats reserved for you.

questions.question: Will the ceremony be indoors or outdoors?
questions.answer: Both the ceremony and reception will be held outdoors, weather permitting. We will have tents available in case of light rain, and an indoor backup plan in case of severe weather.

questions.question: Are children welcome?
questions.answer: While we love your little ones, our wedding will be an adults-only celebration. We hope this gives you a night off to celebrate with us!

questions.question: What if I have dietary restrictions?
questions.answer: Please indicate any dietary restrictions on your RSVP. We will do our best to accommodate your needs.

contact.title: Still have questions?

footer.message: We can't wait to celebrate with you!
